Sentencas: This paper presents investigations into chronoamperometric experiments performed on solid oxide fuel cell fuelled in batch mode by lignite char.
Titulo: Chronoamperometric investigations of electro-oxidation of lignite in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The transient current behaviour resulting from a voltage step change from open circuit voltage (similar to 1 V) to medium voltages (0.89 V) are recorded and analysed with continuous monitoring of outlet anode gas flow by gas chromatography.
Titulo: Chronoamperometric investigations of electro-oxidation of lignite in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, the use of an electrochemical approach for simultaneous determination of diffusion coefficient and chemical constant kinetics from single run experiment was investigated.
Titulo: Chronoamperometric investigations of electro-oxidation of lignite in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A fundamental review of the mechanism path in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell and its electrochemistry has been revisited.
Titulo: Chronoamperometric investigations of electro-oxidation of lignite in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A mechanistic mode has been proposed and experimentally evaluated.
Titulo: Chronoamperometric investigations of electro-oxidation of lignite in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It was found that the reaction mechanism is rate limited by electro-oxidation of CO (anode) and the gas transport is driven mainly by natural convection (anode).
Titulo: Chronoamperometric investigations of electro-oxidation of lignite in direct carbon bed solid oxide fuel cell
